name: May2016-stories
tagline: This repository contains: 1. news articles crawled in May 2016 from 27 RSS feeds of 8 news sources (The Irish Times, The Irish Independent, RTE, TheJournal.ie, Irish Examiner, BBC, Reuters and Al Jazeera) along with the hashtags that were recommended to each of the articles by the Hashtagger 2. news stories extracted from the above mentioned articles as described in Real-time News Story Detection and Tracking with Hashtags 3. visualization of the above mentioned stories.
body: This repository contains: 1. news articles crawled in May 2016 from 27 RSS feeds of 8 news sources (The Irish Times, The Irish Independent, RTE, TheJournal.ie, Irish Examiner, BBC, Reuters and Al Jazeera) along with the hashtags that were recommended to each of the articles by the Hashtagger 2. news stories extracted from the above mentioned articles as described in Real-time News Story Detection and Tracking with Hashtags 3. visualization of the above mentioned stories.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
